Based on 1-20, and because I am an account executive now at ownbackup, see my bio below, give me the I am, the reason, and how it fits me for 1-20>

##
BIO - SUMMARY
Dynamic and results-driven account executive with over a decade of experience in sales and a passion for driving business growth. Recognized for using data-driven strategies to identify market opportunities and for building and maintaining strong client relationships. Known for finding creative solutions to complex problems, and for a competitive focus on meeting and exceeding objectives and metrics. Seeking a challenging and rewarding opportunity to leverage my skills and experience in a dynamic and growing organization.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Account Executive, OwnBackup - SaaS Data Protection Platform Feb 2021 – Present •Achieved significant recognition, including being the first to reach President's Club in segment 2022, closing highest ACV in segment 2022, and being awarded a Top Performer at the Global 2023 Sales Kick-Off event. •Closed deals with 50+ new logos and consistently surpassed quotas, contributing to an increase in overall company revenue.
•Consistently driving revenue growth across numerous verticals, including Finance, Healthcare, Tech, Real Estate, and Retail.
•Built actionable sales plans that resulted in a consistent pipeline of sales opportunities, including a 20% increase in qualified leads within the first six months of 2022.
•Developed and executed rigorous multi-faceted outbound prospecting campaigns that manage all customer communication from initial discovery through close.
•Strong organizational skills to track and map processed outreach via cadences, Salesforce, and personalized calls and emails, resulting in an increased response rate to outbound communication.
•Manage a strategic portfolio of existing customers and partners, uncovering potential areas for future expansion and leading to an increase in total ACV.

##

1. I am experienced in managing a high-velocity sales cycle. Your track record of consistently exceeding quotas and closing deals with 50+ new logos demonstrates your ability to manage a high-velocity sales cycle and prioritize leads effectively.
2. I am able to navigate a very strategic sales process. Your experience with building actionable sales plans and executing multi-faceted outbound prospecting campaigns shows that you are able to navigate a strategic sales process and develop creative solutions to complex problems.
3. I am skilled at managing my pipeline in Salesforce. Your ability to build and maintain a consistent pipeline of sales opportunities, as well as track and map your outreach efforts via Salesforce, demonstrates your skill at managing your pipeline and accurately forecasting revenue.
4. I am experienced in running sales calls with short deck presentations and detailed product demos. Your success in closing the highest ACV in segment 2022 and being recognized as a top performer at the Global 2023 Sales Kick-Off event shows that you are skilled at running sales calls with short deck presentations and detailed product demos.
5. I have a track record of consistently closing business and achieving quota. Your recognition as the first to reach President's Club in segment 2022, as well as consistently exceeding quotas and contributing to an increase in overall company revenue, demonstrates your ability to consistently close business and achieve quota.
6. I am highly knowledgeable about the OwnBackup platform and the competitor landscape. Your experience in driving revenue growth across numerous verticals, as well as managing a strategic portfolio of existing customers and partners, demonstrates your knowledge of the OwnBackup platform and the competitive landscape.
7. I have strong collaboration skills and am able to work closely with the customer success team to ensure a smooth transition for new customers. Your experience in developing and executing outbound prospecting campaigns that manage all customer communication from initial discovery through close demonstrates your ability to collaborate with internal stakeholders and ensure a seamless transition for new customers.
8. I have excellent communication skills and am able to build rapport with a variety of stakeholders. Your ability to consistently exceed quotas and close deals with 50+ new logos, as well as your recognition as a top performer at the Global 2023 Sales Kick-Off event, demonstrates your excellent communication skills and ability to build rapport with a variety of stakeholders.
9. I am adept at building strong relationships with customers and internal stakeholders. Your success in managing a strategic portfolio of existing customers and partners, as well as your recognition as a top performer at the Global 2023 Sales Kick-Off event, demonstrates your ability to build strong relationships with customers and internal stakeholders.
10. I am a skilled problem-solver and am able to navigate complex sales cycles and overcome objections. Your success in driving revenue growth across numerous verticals, as well as consistently exceeding quotas and contributing to an increase in overall company revenue, demonstrates your ability to navigate complex sales cycles and overcome objections.
11. I am adaptable and resilient, with a track record of thriving in fast-paced and constantly changing environments. Your success in consistently exceeding quotas and contributing to an increase in overall company revenue, as well as your recognition as a top performer at the Global 2023 Sales Kick-Off event, demonstrates your ability to thrive in fast-paced and constantly changing environments.
12. I have experience carrying a high annual quota. Your success in achieving significant recognition, including being the first to reach President's Club in segment 2022 and closing the highest ACV in segment 2022, demonstrates your experience carrying a high annual quota.
13. I have experience selling SaaS products in B2B markets. Your experience with driving revenue growth across numerous verticals, as well as consistently exceeding quotas and contributing to an increase in overall company revenue, demonstrates your experience selling software-as-a-service products in B2B markets.

14. I have experience selling data protection or backup software. Your current role as an account executive at OwnBackup, a SaaS data protection platform, demonstrates your experience selling data protection or backup software.
15. I am able to manage a strategic portfolio of existing customers and partners, uncovering potential areas for future expansion and leading to an increase in total ACV. Your success in managing a strategic portfolio of existing customers and partners, as well as your recognition as a top performer at the Global 2023 Sales Kick-Off event, demonstrates your ability to uncover potential areas for future expansion and increase total ACV.

Your success in developing and executing multi-faceted outbound prospecting campaigns, as well as consistently exceeding quotas and contributing to an increase in overall company revenue, demonstrates your ability to think creatively and come up with innovative solutions.
17. I am passionate about using data-driven strategies to identify market opportunities and drive business growth. Your recognition for using data-driven strategies to identify market opportunities, as well as your success in driving revenue growth across numerous verticals, demonstrates your passion for using data to drive business growth.
18. I am comfortable working independently and managing my own schedule. Your success in developing and executing outbound prospecting campaigns, as well as consistently exceeding quotas and contributing to an increase in overall company revenue, demonstrates your ability to work independently and manage your own schedule.
19. I am committed to providing exceptional customer service and ensuring customer success. Your success in managing a strategic portfolio of existing customers and partners, as well as your recognition as a top performer at the Global 2023 Sales Kick-Off event, demonstrates your commitment to providing exceptional customer service and ensuring customer success.
20. I am committed to continuous learning and development. Your recognition as a top performer at the Global 2023 Sales Kick-Off event, as well as your experience in attending training and development programs, demonstrates your commitment to continuous learning and development.

The rippling role has 100% inbound, I was told they expect each rep to have 20-25 calls a month, the average deal time is 45 days, with a monthly quota of 80k. Based on this numbers, what do you expect the hiring manager wants to hear?

Based on the information you provided, the hiring manager for the Rippling role is likely looking for an Account Executive who can:

1. Demonstrate experience managing a high volume of inbound leads and a willingness to make 20-25 calls per month to engaged prospects.
2. Show a track record of successfully navigating a strategic sales process with a 45-day deal time.
3. Prove an ability to consistently meet or exceed a monthly quota of $80,000.
4. Demonstrate strong organizational and time management skills to effectively prioritize and manage a high volume of inbound leads.
5. Exhibit a solid understanding of HRIS/HCM software and security-related products, as well as the ability to become an expert in the Rippling platform.
6. Show a passion for helping businesses streamline their HR and IT processes.
7. Demonstrate excellent communication skills and an ability to deliver compelling sales presentations and product demos.
8. Possess a deep understanding of the competitor landscape and the ability to position Rippling as a superior solution.
9. Prove an ability to work collaboratively with the customer success team to ensure a seamless transition for new customers.
10. Demonstrate a commitment to continuous learning and development to stay up-to-date on industry trends and new product features.
